create(concepts) → {Promise(Concept, error)}

Add a list of concepts given an id and name
Parameters:
Name Type Description
concepts object | Array.<object> Can be a single media object or an array of media objects
Properties
Name Type Description
concept object
Properties
Name Type Description
id object The new concept's id
name object The new concept's name

search(name) → {Promise(Models, error)}

Search for a concept given a name. A wildcard can be given (example: The name "bo*" will match with "boat" and "bow" given those concepts exist
Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string The name of the concept to search for
